August 7, 1940
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
Executive Secretary
The National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
My dear Franks
I dictated a letter to you Monday which I
hope you have by this time. H0wever, if anything
went wrong with it, I am completing your questionnaire.
I h$ve an idea that the Morrison Hotel, be¬
cause of its size and facilities, would not only be
the best place but give you the best concessions. You
might check with the Stevens Hotel as the second choice
and the Congress as the third*
Is there a chance of getting any of the people
associated with the Chicago Round Table or the University
of Chicago? Another suggestion of mine would be a side
trip to WHA to look over the Wisconsin set up. I, for
one, would be interested in it, but I may be the only
one.
You will surely receive more answers on this
questionnaire and I know the convention will be a great
success.
Sincerely yours.
Director
